isis.stitle: 7 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS SPICER PS110-7, PS145-7 - CLEAN AND INSPECT

svcproc.title: CLEAN
svcproc.para: Prior to reassembly, wash all parts thoroughly.

warning.para: Refer to the solvent manufacturer's safety precautions to prevent personal injury or transmission damage.

caution.para: Do not use water or steam to clean internal components. If you do, it could cause corrosion of these components.

warning.para: Do not use gasoline to clean parts. Gasoline can explode, causing serious physical injury.

svcproc.para: Dry the parts immediately with compressed air. Coat them with lubricant if they are to be reassembled immediately. Refer to GROUP 10 - LUBRICATION in the CTS-5000 Master Service Manual for the recommended lubricants. If the parts are to be stored, coat them with a rust inhibitor and wrap them to keep contamination out.
